name: The Aurelia Blog - Page 11
description: The official blog of the Aurelia project and Core Team.

posts.name: Introducing Monterey
posts.description: One of Aurelia's greatest strengths is the dedication and ingenuity of its community. Today we'd like to introduce you to a community group that is building all sorts of tools and extensions for Aurelia. Fittingly, they call themselves the Aurelia Tools Team. Read on to hear directly from their team lead, Adriatic, about the exciting new technology they are building for Aurelia developers.

posts.name: Release Update - 9/29/2016
posts.description: This week we've got more improvements and fixes in the core. We've also got some sweet new features for the validation library.

posts.name: Aurelia Q&A with BeMyApp
posts.description: Recently BeMyApp [http://media.bemyapp.com] asked its community to send in a few questions about Aurelia. In response to those questions, Aurelia's Team Lead recorded this video Q&A [http://media.bemyapp.com/rob-eisenberg-answers-questions-aurelia/].

posts.name: Durandal 2.2.0 Release
posts.description: Today we're pleased to announce the release of Durandal 2.2.0. This release updates Durandal's Knockout dependency and fixes a number of bugs.

posts.name: Release Update - 9/22/2016
posts.description: Today's release contains some new features for routing, path parsing and the cli, along with various bug fixes in other places.

posts.name: Release Update - 9/13/2016
posts.description: This week we've pushed out several patch releases to polyfills, router and validation. You can read the full release notes below.

posts.name: Blue Spire Acquires Aurelia
posts.description: Today we're announcing that Blue Spire has acquired Aurelia from Durandal Inc. and that we're re-comitting ourselves to open source excellence.
